fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - (Only usable starting night 2.) Check someone at night. You will learn three random roles,

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of Night 2, choose one of the following to be added to your ability:
> - one of which will be your target's role, and one from a faction opposing the target. If they're not a member of the Town, they'll learn they were investigated, and the result you were given. Your results can only contain roles that can exist in the current game.
> - the majority of which will be able to win with your target, given your target's current win condition.
> - one of which belonging to a player on the same team as the target.
- You can't check the same target twice.
